title: Handle Game Server Hardware Failure
description: A physical game server reports a critical hardware failure (e.g., a failed hard drive) and goes offline.

tasks.description: Acknowledge the hardware failure alert from the data center monitoring system.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent identifies the specific server and the nature of the hardware fault.

tasks.description: Remove the failed server from the active matchmaking pool.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent successfully updates the matchmaking configuration to stop sending players to the dead server.

tasks.description: Create a ticket for the data center operations team to physically replace the failed hard drive.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent creates a hardware replacement ticket.
